projects.title: Definition of Digital Twin (DT) and DT Framework
projects.description: Establishes foundational concepts and structural approaches for digital twins.

projects.title: Quantifying and Reducing Uncertainty in Digital Twins
projects.description: Focuses on uncertainty quantification methodologies within DT systems.

projects.title: Reduce Time & Cost in Commissioning & Reconfiguration
projects.description: Addresses virtual commissioning to streamline manufacturing setup and adaptation.

projects.title: Digital Twins for Human-Robot Collaboration
projects.description: Explores DT applications in collaborative manufacturing environments with robotic systems.

projects.title: Aggregation of Digital Twins to Improve KPIs
projects.description: Investigates how multiple DTs can be integrated to enhance key performance indicators.

projects.title: Digital Twins Workforce Enabling Tools
projects.description: Develops solutions to support worker capabilities through digital twin technology.

projects.title: Digital Twin Developer, User & Training Environment
projects.description: Creates platforms for DT development, operation, and skill development.

projects.title: AutoTwin: Self-generating Self-executing DT Models
projects.description: Develops autonomous digital twin systems that can generate and execute themselves.
